caseStudies.title: 400% Observability Increase
caseStudies.challenge: Limited visibility into application performance and infrastructure health
caseStudies.solution: Implemented Honeycomb.io for observability and Terraform for infrastructure as code

additionalBenefits: Reduced mean time to resolution by 60%

caseStudies.title: SOC 2 Compliance Success
caseStudies.challenge: Needed SOC 2 Type II certification to secure major enterprise contracts
caseStudies.solution: Comprehensive SOC 2 readiness program including security controls, documentation, and audit preparation

results.description: Audit success rate with zero findings

caseStudies.title: Legacy System Modernization
caseStudies.challenge: Legacy infrastructure causing deployment delays and reliability issues
caseStudies.solution: Migrated to cloud-native architecture with automated CI/CD pipelines

caseStudies.title: DevOps Team Training & Enablement
caseStudies.challenge: Internal team lacked DevSecOps expertise and best practices
caseStudies.solution: Comprehensive training program and mentorship for internal DevOps team

testimonials.name: Sarah K.
testimonials.quote: Maurice's approach to DevSecOps is exactly what we needed - practical, results-driven, and immediately actionable. The observability improvements alone saved us countless hours of debugging.

testimonials.name: David M.
testimonials.quote: Finally, someone who understands both the technical and business sides. The SOC 2 preparation was seamless, and we passed with zero findings.

testimonials.name: Jennifer L.
testimonials.quote: Maurice doesn't just implement solutions - he teaches your team to own and maintain them. That knowledge transfer is invaluable.
